mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, userName, userId, subject, content, checkNotice, hitCount, created, userIdx) VALUES(#{num}, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{checkNotice}, 0, SYSDATE, #{userIdx})
INSERT INTO noticeFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select:
SELECT n.num, n.userId, n.userName, subject, hitCount, created,NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num=f.num
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT n.num, checkNotice, userId, userName, subject, hitCount, created, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount, userIdx, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num=f.num WHERE checkNotice = 1 ORDER BY created DESC ,num DESC

SELECT num, subject FROM notice n
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM notice
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
